column2: ##creating an IMON again using the first 5 studies reported within the downloaded tsv file, grouping by studies and colouring the nodes/edges of the graph based on these groups:
IMON <- PanViz::get_grouped_IMON(dataframe = snp_df, groupby = "studies", ego = 5, save_file = FALSE, colour_groups = TRUE)
